goal: Single-agent iterative content generation with quality validation

database.description: blog_posts table exists with proper schema and constraints
steps: Query Supabase schema for blog_posts table
Verify columns: id, title, content, status, published_at, created_at, updated_at
Insert a test record with status='draft'
Verify CHECK constraint rejects invalid status values
Confirm test record appears in SELECT query

database.description: blog_content_drafts table exists with foreign keys and unique constraint
steps: Query Supabase schema for blog_content_drafts table
Verify all columns exist: id, blog_post_id, iteration_number, content, title, agent_name, critique, quality_score, improvements, token_count, api_cost_cents, created_at
Insert draft with iteration_number=1 for existing blog_post
Attempt to insert duplicate iteration_number for same blog_post_id
Verify UNIQUE constraint prevents duplicate (should fail)

database.description: blog_agent_activity table exists for logging agent actions
steps: Query Supabase schema for blog_agent_activity table
Verify columns: id, agent_name, activity_type, context_id, duration_ms, success, error_message, metadata, created_at
Verify CHECK constraint rejects invalid activity types

database.description: blog_rss_sources table exists for managing RSS feeds
steps: Query Supabase schema for blog_rss_sources table
Verify columns: id, name, url, category, active, priority, last_fetched_at, created_at, updated_at
Insert RSS source with active=true, priority=5
Verify UNIQUE constraint on url prevents duplicate

database.description: blog_rss_items table exists with foreign keys to sources and posts
steps: Query Supabase schema for blog_rss_items table
Verify columns: id, source_id, title, url, summary, published_at, relevance_score, used_in_blog, created_at
Insert RSS item linked to valid source_id
Verify foreign key to blog_rss_sources works
Confirm UNIQUE constraint on url column exists

database.description: Database indexes created for query performance
steps: Verify index exists on (blog_post_id, iteration_number DESC)
Verify indexes exist on (agent_name, created_at DESC) and (activity_type, created_at DESC)
Verify partial index on blog_rss_items where used_in_blog IS NULL

database.description: 5 manufacturing RSS sources seeded and active
steps: Verify at least 5 RSS sources exist
Check that all sources have active=true
Manually fetch one RSS URL to confirm it's accessible

services.description: services package is importable and supabase_service provides client
steps: Verify Supabase client object is returned
Check that SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_KEY are loaded from environment
Verify function returns a UUID blog_post_id
Query blog_posts table for the created record
Confirm title, content, and status match input
Verify iteration_number, content, and quality_score are correct
Attempt to save duplicate iteration_number and verify it fails
Confirm agent_name, activity_type, success, and metadata are stored
Verify function returns a list of RSS sources
Check that all returned sources have active=true
Verify sources are ordered by priority DESC
Confirm at least 5 sources are returned

services.description: rss_service.fetch_feed_items() fetches and stores RSS items
steps: Get a valid RSS source_id from database
Verify function returns list of RSS items
Confirm new items are stored with title, url, summary, published_at
Get unused RSS item IDs from database
Query blog_rss_items for those item IDs
Verify used_in_blog column is set to the blog_id
Create test content with 'leverage' and 'unlock' keywords
Create content with proper ## and ### headings

services.description: quality_validator checks brand voice (not salesy, professional)
steps: Create content with excessive exclamation marks
Create high-quality content (1500 words, headings, no slop)
Create content with AI slop keyword

ralph_core.description: ralph package structure exists and is importable
steps: Verify all imports succeed without errors

ralph_core.description: timeout_manager.TimeoutManager tracks time and cost limits
timeout_manager calculates API costs from tokens
steps: Verify returns cost in cents as integer

ralph_core.description: critique.py defines AI slop keywords and critique prompt
steps: Verify at least 15 forbidden keywords exist
Verify critique prompt template is defined and non-empty
Check that AI_SLOP_KEYWORDS matches quality_validator list

ralph_core.description: critique prompt includes JSON output specification with quality score
steps: Check that example JSON response is provided in prompt

ralph_core.description: content_generation.py provides initial draft and improvement prompts
steps: Verify initial draft prompt is defined
Verify improvement prompt template is defined
Check that both prompts mention manufacturing industry and MAS Precision Parts

ralph_core.description: BaseAgent abstract class provides Claude API integration
steps: Verify BaseAgent is an abstract class
Check that BaseAgent has token tracking attributes

ralph_core.description: BaseAgent tracks input and output tokens across calls
steps: Create a concrete implementation of BaseAgent for testing
Verify it returns tuple of (input_tokens, output_tokens)
Verify tokens accumulate across multiple calls

ralph_core.description: ProductMarketingAgent generates initial blog content from RSS
steps: Get RSS items from database (3-5 items)
Check that content is 1000+ words and mentions manufacturing

ralph_core.description: ProductMarketingAgent improves content based on critique
steps: Create sample content with known issues
Create critique dict with specific improvement suggestions
Verify improved content addresses critique points

ralph_core.description: RalphLoop generates initial draft and creates blog post record
steps: Verify blog_posts record is created with status='draft'
Check that RSS items are marked as used

functional.description: RalphLoop iteratively improves content until quality threshold reached
steps: Create RalphLoop instance with quality threshold 0.85
Verify quality_score increases with each iteration

functional.description: RalphLoop publishes blog when quality threshold reached
steps: Confirm final content matches best iteration

functional.description: RalphLoop saves as draft when timeout reached before quality threshold
steps: Query blog_posts and verify status='draft' (if quality >= 0.70)

functional.description: RalphLoop saves as draft when cost limit reached before quality threshold
steps: Run RalphLoop (will hit cost limit quickly)
Verify loop stops when cost > limit

functional.description: RalphLoop fails explicitly if quality below 0.70 at limits
steps: Run RalphLoop (will timeout with low quality)
Check that error log/alert is generated
Confirm all iterations are still saved in database

functional.description: RalphLoop logs all agent activity to blog_agent_activity table
RalphLoop can be run from command line
steps: Verify script executes without import errors
Check that blog post is generated
Verify summary is printed to stdout (status, quality, iterations, cost)
Check exit code is 0 for success
Confirm only 1 iteration exists in blog_content_drafts

testing.description: Content improves over 2-3 iterations to reach quality threshold
steps: Verify quality increases with each iteration

testing.description: AI slop detection forces quality below 0.50
steps: Manually insert draft with 'delve' or 'leverage' in content
Run quality validation on that content
Verify found_keywords includes the forbidden phrase

testing.description: System can generate 5 successful posts end-to-end
steps: Calculate average quality score across 5 posts
Check average iterations is 2-4 per post

testing.description: No AI slop keywords in any published content
steps: For each post, run AI slop detection on content
Verify no forbidden keywords found in published posts
Document any edge cases (legitimate keyword use)
Confirm zero AI slop in production content

testing.description: API costs average below $0.25 per post
steps: Query blog_content_drafts for recent blog posts
Check that no single post exceeded $1.00 (cost limit)

documentation.description: README includes Phase 1 setup and usage instructions
steps: Verify section exists for 'Phase 1 - Core Ralph Loop'
Check that database setup steps are documented
Confirm manual run command is provided: `python -m ralph.core.ralph_loop`
Verify SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_KEY are present
Verify ANTHROPIC_API_KEY and ANTHROPIC_MODEL are present
Verify Ralph settings: RALPH_TIMEOUT_MINUTES, RALPH_QUALITY_THRESHOLD, RALPH_QUALITY_FLOOR, RALPH_COST_LIMIT_CENTS
Check that placeholder values and comments explain each variable
